gov.noaa.pmel.sgt
Class LayerStack

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          gov.noaa.pmel.sgt.LayerStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
LayerControl, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class LayerStack
extends java.awt.Container
implements LayerControl

LayerStack is used to manage a group of layers together.

Since:
2.x
See Also:
Serialized Form
